snippet.title: Game & Watch - Donkey Kong (c)1982 Nintendo [MAME emulation footage]
snippet.description:
Donkey Kong is a Game & Watch title from Nintendo, it was one of the earlier releases.  This is another that's been emulated for a while now, but for which there wasn't a high quality video on this channel.  Thanks as always to hap and Sean Riddle for the emulation on display here.  A number of people have said the controls seem less responsive on this game than some of the others, but that appears to be by design.

Game & Watch artwork for MAME was done by DarthMarino (more recently emulated units) and hydef (units emulated before 2020)
https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1vl9O-0jIGCHHY_lrWpOwBtqTXEKsVGOY  DarthMarino 
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1WLKcvynl0ky2mRL1UacA9yaiMTnNs4x5 hydef
